email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN WAVE (DWT: 85000, LOA: 225m) available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The cargo size is 75000 MT on CIF terms. Our starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. The laycan is 15-20 October. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Thank you for the offer. USD 18.50 per MT seems a bit high. Can you provide a better rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Alex Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

We can offer USD 18.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

USD 18.00 per MT is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75 per MT? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 17-22 October?

Best regards,
Alex Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

USD 17.75 per MT is acceptable. Laycan adjusted to 17-22 October. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Alex Lee

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Here is the summary of terms:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN WAVE
- Cargo: 75000 MT Coal
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 17-22 October
- Freight: USD 17.75 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 12,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez
